content: Starting with our fourth quarter results, net product sales of CAPLYTA were $87.4 million compared to $25.5 million for the same period in 2021, representing a year-over-year increase of 243% and a 22% increase over the third quarter of 2022. One moment for our next question. One moment for our next question. One moment for our next question. One moment for our next question. One moment for our next question.
